channel.title: I am having Hamachi download problems! PLEASE help!
channel.description:
Ok. This is the story. I have downloaded hamachi before and used it and have had no problem downloading and/or using it, until now. The last tiem I have done this, I tried to download hamachi on another computer. I worked. I clicked on Hamachi-Setup, so it would download Hamachi and run it. Thats where the problem came in. I clicked it and it said "run" or "cancel" I clicked run. Then it said "Log ME into hamachi" or szomehthing liek that. Then it said "Hamachi version 1.0.1.2 has been detected on your computer. Would you like to proceed with an update? Yes or No" i clicked yes and it upated and said "Hamachi has successfully been updated" So I did the same thing again, and it sdid the same thing. So it didn't work.
Now today, I tried to log onto hamachi on this computer(not the other one which I had problems) like normal, and it just stayed at "Logging in" for 20mins straight. I closed it out and tried 3 diff times!! still didnt work, so being me , I unistalled and reinstalled. The same thing happened that happened to my other computer(listed at the top). I reinstalled and unistalled a coupple times and still doesn'twork. Please help me!!! If you have any information on how to fix this problem and let me enjoy hamachi again, please post.

item.title: I am having Hamachi download problems! PLEASE help!
item.dc:creator: @Z0mg_a-santa Z0mg!a-santa
item.description:
@Z0mg_a-santa wrote:

lol, maybe. But they computers are at two diff houses… Sooooo that is prolly not the problem. And anyways, non-ham servers are laggy and ususally are pk and arent as good.

-Not tryin to dis any1

Read full topic

Just tellign you

Sarah
